info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 1:30AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern DuPage and central Cook Counties through 145 AM CDT... At 130 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Westchester to Lemont. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Brookfield, Westchester, La Grange, La Grange Park, Lyons, Hillside, Broadview and Countryside around 135 AM CDT. Berwyn, Oak Park, Maywood, Palos Hills, Forest Park, Hickory Hills, Riverside and North Riverside around 140 AM CDT. Justice, Summit, Bridgeview and Hodgkins around 145 AM CDT. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 271 and 283. I-88 between mile markers 134 and 138. I-290 between mile markers 20 and 21. This includes... Argonne National Laboratory and Brookfield Zoo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
